title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath/output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue is caused by the fact that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the settings or preferences page.
3. Set the output location to a folder that is nested within the source folder.
4. Set the classpath to include certain dependencies.
5. Press the Ok button to save the changes.
6. Observe the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
